page.title: 18Longnor Sports Races
page.content:
The main events at Longnor Races are the horse races.
There are many classes of races including trotters which are horses that pull sulkies which are a kind of cart. There are betting stalls around the track so that you can bet on the races.
Other competitions for horses and ponies include The Best Turned Out, The Mad Gallop and Gymkhana events, all of which children can enter.
Towards the end of the day there are motorbike races. These are after the horse races as they tend to cut up the race track. There is also a five mile running race for those people who want to join in.
